sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
In the below given figure, it is given that \(\angle RTS = \angle TUR \). If \(RT = 5 \) cm, and \(RU = 4 \) cm, then find the length of SU
\newline
tikzpicture{}
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "Consider the triangles RTS and RUT , here we have
\[
	\angle SRT = \angle URT 
\]
\[
	\angle RTS = \angle TUR 
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
So, we can write that
\[
	\Delta RTS \sim \Delta RUT 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{RT }{RU } = \frac{RS }{RT } 
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "$$\text{
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{5 }{4 } = \frac{RS }{5 }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow RS = \frac{25 }{4 }
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
So, now 
\[
	SU = RS - RU = \frac{25 }{4 } - 4 = \frac{9 }{4 } cm
\]"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "$$\text{$\angle SRT = \angle URT$, since both the angles are same and $\angle RTS = \angle TUR $, as it is given}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Therefore, we can write $\Delta RTS \sim \Delta RUT $}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Therefore, we can also write $\frac{RT }{RU } = \frac{RS }{RT }$, as ratios of corresponding sides of similar triangles is proportional.}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Putting the values and solving we get $RS = \frac{25 }{4 }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Since, $SU = RS - RU$, therefore, it is equal to $\frac{25 }{4 } - 4 = \frac{9 }{4 }$ cm.}$$
\newline

"}]
